com.communote.server.core.blog

Class NoteManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.blog.NoteManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NoteManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoteManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public abstract class NoteManagementBase
extends Object
implements NoteManagement

    Spring Service base class for NoteManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    NoteService

    • Method Detail

      • createNote

        public NoteModificationResult createNote(NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO,
                                         Set<String> additionalBlogNameIds)
                                  throws BlogNotFoundException,
                                         NoteManagementAuthorizationException,
                                         NoteStoringPreProcessorException
        Description copied from interface: NoteManagement
        Creates a note from the supplied transfer object.
        Specified by:
        createNote in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteStoringTO - The note to create.
        additionalBlogNameIds - set of blog aliases for creating crossposts. These aliases will be ignore, if the note is a comment to another note.
        Returns:
        The result of this operation.
        Throws:
        BlogNotFoundException - in case the target blog does not exist
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - in case the user is not authorized to create the note, for instance if he has no write access to the target blog
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException - in case one of the pre processors failed

      • deleteAutosave

        public void deleteAutosave(Long noteId)
                    throws NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Deletes an autosave identified by the passed ID. In case there is no autosaved note with this ID nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        deleteAutosave in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - The notes id.
        Throws:
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - Thrown, when it is not possible to access the note.

      • deleteNote

        public void deleteNote(Long noteId,
                       boolean deleteSystemPosts,
                       boolean clientManagerCanDelete)
                throws NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Deletes a user tagged post and all its comments.
        Specified by:
        deleteNote in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - Id of the note to delete.
        deleteSystemPosts - If true system notes will also be deleted.
        clientManagerCanDelete - If true notes will also be deleted, if the current user is a client manager.
        Throws:
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the note.

      • deleteNotesOfUser

        public Set<Long> deleteNotesOfUser(Long userId)
                            throws AuthorizationException
        Delete all notes and drafts of a user. If one of these notes has comments it is not deleted, the content is anonymized instead to preserve the discussion. Additional note data like attachments, mentions and tags are removed.
        Specified by:
        deleteNotesOfUser in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user whose notes should be deleted
        Returns:
        the IDs of the discussions which were modified because of the removal of notes
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user, the client manager or the creator of the notes

      • getCommentsOfDiscussion

        public List<SimpleNoteListItem> getCommentsOfDiscussion(Long noteId)
                                                 throws NoteNotFoundException
        Returns all the notes of a discussion excluding the root note. Notes the current user is not allowed to read, i.e. direct messages that were not sent to that user, won't be included either. It is assumed that the provided user has read access to the blog of the notes. The returned comments are sorted by the creation date in ascending order.
        Specified by:
        getCommentsOfDiscussion in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion will be evaluated
        Returns:
        the notes in the discussion
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - in case the note does not exist

      • getDiscussionId

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Long getDiscussionId(Long noteId)
                                                   throws NoteNotFoundException
        Returns the ID of the discussion the note is part of.
        Specified by:
        getDiscussionId in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note for which the discussion ID should be returned
        Returns:
        the discussion ID
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - in case the note does not exist

      • getNoteWithComments

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public DiscussionNoteData getNoteWithComments(Long noteId,
                                                                            QueryResultConverter<SimpleNoteListItem,DiscussionNoteData> converter)
                                                                     throws NoteNotFoundException,
                                                                            AuthorizationException
        Returns a note with its comments which are ordered according to the provided converter.
        Specified by:
        getNoteWithComments in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the id of the note to retrieve
        converter - the converter to use for filling the comments
        Returns:
        the object holding the data of the note
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - if the requested note does not exist
        AuthorizationException - if the current user has no read access to the note

      • getNumberOfNotesInDiscussion

        public int getNumberOfNotesInDiscussion(Long noteId)
                                 throws NoteNotFoundException
        Returns the number of notes in a discussion. Notes the current user is not allowed to read, i.e. direct messages that were not sent to that user, are not included. It is assumed that the provided user has read access to the blog.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfNotesInDiscussion in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note whose discussion will be evaluated
        Returns:
        the number of notes in the discussion
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - in case the note does not exist

      • getNumberOfReplies

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public int getNumberOfReplies(Long noteId)
                                                     throws NoteNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: NoteManagement
        Returns the number of replies to a note. This includes replies on replies and also replies that are direct messages which the current user might not be able to read.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfReplies in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note
        Returns:
        the number of replies
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - Thrown, when the note doesn't exist.
        See Also:
        NoteService.getNumberOfReplies(Long)

      • handleUpdateNote

        protected abstract NoteModificationResult handleUpdateNote(NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO,
                                                           Long noteId,
                                                           Set<String> additionalBlogNameIds)
                                                    throws NoteNotFoundException,
                                                           NoteManagementAuthorizationException,
                                                           NoteStoringPreProcessorException,
                                                           BlogNotFoundException
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException
        BlogNotFoundException

      • updateNote

        public NoteModificationResult updateNote(NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO,
                                         Long noteId,
                                         Set<String> additionalBlogNameIds)
                                  throws NoteNotFoundException,
                                         NoteManagementAuthorizationException,
                                         NoteStoringPreProcessorException,
                                         BlogNotFoundException
        Updates an existing note with the data of the supplied transfer object.
        Specified by:
        updateNote in interface NoteManagement
        Parameters:
        noteStoringTO - The note to create.
        noteId - the ID of the note to update
        additionalBlogNameIds - set of blog aliases for creating crossposts. These aliases will be ignore, if the note is a comment to another note.
        Returns:
        The result of this operation.
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - in case the note to update does not exist
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - in case the user is not authorized to update the note, for instance if he has no write access to the blog or is not the author of the note
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException - in case one of the pre processors failed
        BlogNotFoundException - in case the target blog does not exist
